mapper.insert: insert into product_table(vendorId, productName, productDesc, productPrice, productFileName, productCategory) values (#{vendorId}, #{productName}, #{productDesc}, #{productPrice}, #{productFileName}, #{productCategory})
mapper.select: select * from product_table where productApproval=1 and productCategory=#{productCategory} order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select * from product_table where productApproval=0 order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select * from product_table where productApproval=1 order by productStar desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(id) from product_table where productApproval=1 and productCategory=#{productCategory}
mapper.update: update product_table set productApproval=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from product_table where productName like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
mapper.update: update product_table set productName=#{productName}, productDesc=#{productDesc}, productPrice=#{productPrice}, productStar=#{productStar} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select p.*, h.id from product_table p, history_table h where p.id = h.productId AND h.clientId = #{clientId};
